pages.text:
About
A classic steakhouse, reimagined in Bonita Springs.
Chops City Grill is one of the most acclaimed steakhouses in Southwest Florida, known for serving dry-aged USDA Prime steaks and premium cuts of Japanese and Australian Wagyu. Located near Bonita Bay, we offer a fine dining experience that blends timeless sophistication with modern energy. Our menu features chilled seafood towers, chef-driven seafood dishes, inventive sushi, and one of the region’s most extensive wine and whiskey lists. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or enjoying a relaxed evening out, Chops delivers seamless service and elevated flavor in every detail. Join us for our Summer 3-Course All Night Menu, nightly steakhouse specials like Prime Rib Mondays and Wagyu Wednesdays, or explore The Bar Collection and Summer Uncorked — featuring bar bites, handcrafted cocktails, and 30% off all bottles of wine. For the best steakhouse experience in Bonita Springs, Chops City Grill is where every guest feels celebrated.
